name: single-runtime
description: Control Sharing Panel. Lets you change share resolver in the app via GUI

scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm build && pnpm exec playwright install --with-deps && CI=1 pnpm exec playwright test --reporter=list
scripts.legacy:e2e:ci: pnpm legacy:build && pnpm exec playwright install --with-deps && USE_LEGACY=true CI=1 pnpm exec playwright test --reporter=list
